Financial Help and Advice

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="container" css=".vc_custom_1459251841324{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Whether it's the research and evaluation done by our investment professionals, or the dedicated care of our world-class customer support specialists, the people behind our technology make all the difference.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]We knew that by aligning our incentives with our customers, without compromise, we could build something truly significant. With that in mind, we set out to deliver sophisticated financial products and advice to everyone. We knew that the way to build a better solution was through the use of smarter technology. We built an experience that replaced confusion with delight, and uncertainty with control. We're aiming to bring back the feeling of defined benefits, and the financial peace of mind that goes with it. We envision a world where you can be confident of reaching your goals, whatever they may be.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container"][vc_column][vc_separator color="#eeeeee" type="normal" thickness="1" up="" down=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" css=".vc_custom_1459253963078{margin-top: 13px !important;margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1459254441380{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

Fintech at a Glance

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color="#00c96d" align="align_left" type="small" position="center" thickness="2" up="" down=""][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1459438497309{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;}"]The numbers that matter, they shape everything we do.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1459251898962{padding-top: 32px !important;}"][vc_column_text]
150 Team members worldwide
19 countries in which Fintech operates
43 funds sponsored since 2012
21 years of operation since 1995
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row parallax="content-moving" parallax_image="71051" parallax_speed_bg="3" type="full_page_width_inner_container" css=".vc_custom_1464195674723{margin-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #777777 !important;background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1459293078246{margin-top: 80px !important;margin-bottom: 80px !important;padding-top: 5px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"]

A Great Place to Work

Here’s the secret sauce to our benefits and perks: It’s all about removing barriers so staff can focus on the things they love, both inside and outside of work. We’re constantly searching for unique ways to improve your health and happiness. Discover more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container"][vc_column][vc_text_separator title="Explore this Section" title_align="separator_align_left" align="align_left" css=".vc_custom_1459263419346{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" css=".vc_custom_1459263391508{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1459263829716{margin-bottom: 10px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;}"]

Corporate Responsibility

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1459438251483{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;}"]We believe that improving our impact on society strengthens our firm and fulfills our fundamental business purpose.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1459263840531{margin-bottom: 10px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;}"]

What We Do

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1459438260051{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;}"]We always invest the trust in a risk-adjusted, globally diversified investment portfolio of low-cost ETFs to maximize returns.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1459263859985{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}"]

Frequent Questions

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Your most common questions answered in our easy to follow FAQ guide for existing and potential customers.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Solutions
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="container"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1459296426326{margin-top: -10px !important;}"]

Whether it's the research and evaluation done by our investment professionals, or the dedicated care of our world-class customer support specialists, the people behind our technology make all the difference.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" css=".vc_custom_1458321011332{padding-top: 15px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="71078" img_size="full" style="vc_box_rounded" onclick="custom_link" link="#" css=".vc_custom_1464203368328{margin-bottom: -10px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1464203399809{margin-bottom: 10px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;}"]

Financial Help

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1458660605234{padding-right: 10px !important;}"]We’ll tell you how to allocate your money across stocks and bonds and how much to invest each month and year.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="71078" img_size="full" style="vc_box_rounded" onclick="custom_link" link="#" css=".vc_custom_1464203389145{margin-bottom: -10px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1464203410662{margin-bottom: 10px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;}"]

Mutual Trusts

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1459119647079{padding-right: 10px !important;}"]We always invest the trust in a risk-adjusted, globally diversified investment portfolio of low-cost ETFs to maximize returns.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="71078" img_size="full" style="vc_box_rounded" onclick="custom_link" link="#" css=".vc_custom_1464203465360{margin-bottom: -10px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1464203420955{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}"]

Pensions & IRAs

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Fintech calculates your pension gap, or the difference between how much money you’ll have and how much you’ll need.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" css=".vc_custom_1458321119819{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="71078" img_size="full" style="vc_box_rounded" onclick="custom_link" link="#" css=".vc_custom_1464203525879{margin-bottom: -10px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1464203535819{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}"]

Retirement

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Our investment approach for retirement is based on extensive research and backtested to provide a tailored experience.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="71078" img_size="full" style="vc_box_rounded" onclick="custom_link" link="#" css=".vc_custom_1464203491248{margin-bottom: -10px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1464203502039{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}"]

Tax Efficiency

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]We are built from scratch from the ground up to invest every dollar of your money tax efficiently so that it works for you.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="71078" img_size="full" style="vc_box_rounded" onclick="custom_link" link="#" css=".vc_custom_1464203454255{margin-bottom: -10px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1458660674998{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}"]

Wealth Advice

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]We can help you establish a robust financial foundation while providing the ongoing advice you need to preserve and enhance your wealth.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Experts are behind every choice we make.

item.title: What We Do
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="container" padding_top="" padding_bottom="" css=".vc_custom_1449576470084{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]
The portfolio is designed to achieve optimal returns at every level of risk. Through diversification, automated rebalancing, better behavior, and lower fees, our customers can expect 4.30% higher returns than a typical DIY investor.
Our Tax Loss Harvesting systematically finds embedded capital losses to lower investment taxes and increase after-tax returns. The better we know you, the better advice we can give – which is why you can securely sync your outside investments. You can see your total net worth in one place, and we can advise you on how much you're losing to fees and idle cash.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" css=".vc_custom_1459356231913{padding-top: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 18px !important;}"][vc_column width="3/4"][vc_single_image image="71055" img_size="large" add_caption="yes"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" css=".vc_custom_1458060471484{padding-top: 2px !important;}"][vc_separator color="#00c96d" type="normal" thickness="2" up="" down="25"][vc_column_text]
We believe in passive investing, which means taking on the right level of risk for your time horizon, and letting our advanced algorithms do all the work.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" padding_top="" padding_bottom="" css=".vc_custom_1444503683289{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_separator color="#e2e2e2" type="normal" thickness="1" up="" down="" el_class="dotted"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" padding_top="" padding_bottom=""][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Advice across all of your wealth.

Each investment portfolio is designed to get customers optimal investor returns. Our goal-based investing framework and advice algorithm let customers know if they are on track to reach their investment goals like Retirement or a Safety Net Fund, in seconds.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" padding_top="" padding_bottom="" css=".vc_custom_1449063285344{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs style="flat" shape="square" color="white" active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="End-to-end Investing" tab_id="1444300654691-e081e086-5ad3"][vc_column_text]By handling every part of the investment process we provide the best possible experience to customers. This means some of the fastest cash transfers in the industry, tax forms available at the earliest possible date, and tighter security because of less exposure to third-party risk.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Delightful Design" tab_id="1444300654474-2bfb86dc-fd3a"][vc_column_text]Use one login to access and manage multiple portfolios with our intuitive dashboard. We offer the flexibility to invest in taxable accounts, IRAs, and trusts.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Better Execution" tab_id="1444412836340-fe4dda89-2f8e"][vc_column_text]We put every cent of your money to work by purchasing fractional shares, which means no loss of performance due to holding cash. Ask any other online investment manager if they're able to do that.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: We invest your money in a globally diversified portfolio of low-cost index funds and give you personalized financial advice.

item.title: A Great Place to Work
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="container" padding_top="" padding_bottom="" css=".vc_custom_1458057033586{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

When it comes to our benefits and perks, we have everything you’d expect from a large company, like health insurance, retirement benefits and so on. But we also offer way more than the basics.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container"][vc_column][vc_separator color="#eeeeee" type="normal" thickness="1" up="" down=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" css=".vc_custom_1459267838981{padding-top: 3px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

We want to make your life better.

Here’s the secret sauce to our benefits and perks: It’s all about removing barriers so staff can focus on the things they love, both inside and outside of work. We’re constantly searching for unique ways to improve your health and happiness.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

We want our benefits to work for you.

Your interests and needs evolve over your lifetime. Likewise, we evaluate our benefits regularly and adapt them to the needs of our changing population. You’re valuable to us, and our benefits and perks are there to show it.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" css=".vc_custom_1458057665089{padding-top: 15px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="71055" img_size="large" add_caption="yes" style="vc_box_rounded" css=".vc_custom_1464199928683{margin-top: 2px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1458060471484{padding-top: 2px !important;}"][vc_separator color="#00c96d" type="normal" thickness="2" up="" down="25"][vc_column_text]

Stay healthy, save time

On-site physicians and nurses, convenient medical services, and comprehensive health care coverage help keep you healthy and happy. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" css=".vc_custom_1459268358036{padding-top: 10px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="71055" img_size="large" add_caption="yes" style="vc_box_rounded" css=".vc_custom_1464199944830{margin-top: 2px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1458060471484{padding-top: 2px !important;}"][vc_separator color="#00c96d" type="normal" thickness="2" up="" down="25"][vc_column_text]

Travel without worries

Staff and their families are covered with travel insurance and emergency assistance - even on personal vacations. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" css=".vc_custom_1459268399068{margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 10px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="71055" img_size="large" add_caption="yes" style="vc_box_rounded" css=".vc_custom_1464199958213{margin-top: 2px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1458060471484{padding-top: 2px !important;}"][vc_separator color="#00c96d" type="normal" thickness="2" up="" down="25"][vc_column_text]

More time with your baby

New parents get time off and some extra spending money to help them welcome their new bundle of joy to the world.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: We have a number of benefit programs and onsite amenities to support you and your loved ones through life’s various stages and situations.

item.title: Corporate Responsibility
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="container" padding_top="" padding_bottom="" css=".vc_custom_1458057033586{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

At Fintech we are very aware of our Corporate Social Responsibility. Our staff give their time and commitment to a number of charities throughout the year. Below is a snapshot of the charities we have worked with this year.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" css=".vc_custom_1458057665089{padding-top: 15px !important;}"][vc_column width="3/4"][vc_single_image image="71055" img_size="large" add_caption="yes"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" css=".vc_custom_1458060471484{padding-top: 2px !important;}"][vc_separator color="#00c96d" type="normal" thickness="2" up="" down="25"][vc_column_text]
WWF and its partners are working on the development of a program to translocate Javan rhinos from Ujung Kulon National Park to establish a new herd in other suitable habitat in Indonesia.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" css=".vc_custom_1459261450511{margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 15px !important;}"][vc_column width="3/4"][vc_single_image image="71055" img_size="large" add_caption="yes"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" css=".vc_custom_1458060471484{padding-top: 2px !important;}"][vc_separator color="#00c96d" type="normal" thickness="2" up="" down="25"][vc_column_text]
A Long Walk to Water has electrified young readers across the country and inspired many of them to raise money to build more wells in South Sudan. To date, the efforts of children have raised more than $1 million for projects.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: We believe that improving our impact on society strengthens our company and fulfils our business purpose.

item.title: Financial Help
item.dc:creator: cpadmin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="container" padding_top="" padding_bottom="" css=".vc_custom_1458057033586{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]
We understand you're saving for all different life events: retirement, a house, simply to build wealth, or all of the above. Your investment account should adjust to your life — not the other way around.
We give you personalized advice, based not only on your portfolio, but on all of your wealth. We'll tell you how to allocate your money across stocks and bonds, how much to invest each month, and how much your outside investments are costing you in fees. Once we understand your goals, we customize our advice and build a personalized investment plan and portfolio for each one. When your portfolio is properly risk-adjusted, you're set up to achieve optimal returns, helping you to meet your goals quickly.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" css=".vc_custom_1458057665089{padding-top: 15px !important;}"][vc_column width="3/4"][vc_single_image image="71055" img_size="large" add_caption="yes"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" css=".vc_custom_1458060471484{padding-top: 2px !important;}"][vc_separator color="#00c96d" type="normal" thickness="2" up="" down="25"][vc_column_text]
When you can give each dollar a specific purpose and attach a real outcome to the reason for your saving, you're more likely to actually achieve success.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" css=".vc_custom_1458058074975{margin-bottom: -25px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_separator color="#e2e2e2" type="normal" thickness="1" up="20" down="20"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1458058396279{padding-bottom: 5px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

Key aspects of our strategy

Choose an approach that's right for you

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" padding_top="" padding_bottom="" css=".vc_custom_1458059370470{padding-top: 5px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1444994609696{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_round_chart stroke_width="2" legend="" values="%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%22Stocks%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2250%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22green%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Bonds%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2250%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22blue%22%7D%5D" css=".vc_custom_1458221310059{padding-right: 40px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1458059197542{margin-top: -15px !important;}"]

Major Purchase

This is for investors who are saving for a home down payment, future tuition, or any other specific purchase or event.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1444994618757{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_round_chart stroke_width="2" legend="" values="%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%22Stocks%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2290%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22blue%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Bonds%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2210%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22green%22%7D%5D" css=".vc_custom_1458221326171{padding-right: 40px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1459104054252{margin-top: -15px !important;}"]

Build Wealth

Often you don't have a specific reason to save your money but still want to grow your wealth over a long period of time.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1444994626335{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_round_chart stroke_width="2" legend="" values="%5B%7B%22title%22%3A%22Stocks%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2240%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22blue%22%7D%2C%7B%22title%22%3A%22Bonds%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2260%22%2C%22color%22%3A%22green%22%7D%5D" css=".vc_custom_1458221338364{padding-right: 40px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1458059276358{margin-top: -15px !important;}"]

Safety Net

This is one of the highest priority goals we recommend for investors, designed to ensure you have an emergency fund.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Retirement
item.dc:creator: cpadmin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="container" padding_top="" padding_bottom="" css=".vc_custom_1458057033586{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]
Our app calculates your retirement gap, or the difference between how much money you'll have and how much you'll need.
Unlike other retirement tools, It takes everything in your life into account: where you live, your current savings, your income and tax rate, and your spouse's holdings. Your personalized plan refreshes daily based on your account balances to give you more accurate advice. Get one place to sync and view all of your savings accounts — even if they’re with other providers. Our approach is based on extensive research and backtested to provide a tailored experience. We use technology, investment expertise, and a fresh take on withdrawal methodology to provide sustainable cash flow while you enjoy retirement.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" css=".vc_custom_1458057665089{padding-top: 15px !important;}"][vc_column width="3/4"][vc_single_image image="71055" img_size="large" add_caption="yes"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" css=".vc_custom_1458060471484{padding-top: 2px !important;}"][vc_separator color="#00c96d" type="normal" thickness="2" up="" down="25"][vc_column_text]

item.title: Pensions & IRAs
item.dc:creator: cpadmin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="container" padding_top="" padding_bottom="" css=".vc_custom_1458057033586{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]
Fintech calculates your retirement gap, or the difference between how much money you'll have and how much you'll need.
Unlike other retirement tools, Fintech takes everything in your life into account: where you live, your current savings, your income and tax rate, and your spouse's holdings. Your Fintech plan refreshes daily based on your account balances to give you more accurate advice. Never run out of money. We use technology, investment expertise, and a fresh take on withdrawal methodology to provide sustainable cash flow while you enjoy retirement.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" css=".vc_custom_1458057665089{padding-top: 15px !important;}"][vc_column width="3/4"][vc_single_image image="71055" img_size="large" add_caption="yes"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" css=".vc_custom_1458060471484{padding-top: 2px !important;}"][vc_separator color="#00c96d" type="normal" thickness="2" up="" down="25"][vc_column_text]
We take the information you give us, recommend an allocation, and tell you a safe amount to withdraw from your nest egg. Portfolio growth and inflation are factored into our ongoing advice, but you have the final say.

item.title: Mutual Trusts
item.dc:creator: cpadmin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="container" padding_top="" padding_bottom="" css=".vc_custom_1458057033586{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]
A Mutual Fund Trust ("MFT") is a unit trust in which all holdings and transactions in the units comply with the prescribed conditions governing: the number of unit holders; the dispersal of ownership of the units: and public trading of the units.
If a trust becomes a MFT within 90 days after the end of its first taxation year, it may make an election with the CRA to be treated as such from the beginning of that taxation year. Under Canadian Federal Legislation, a trust may elect to have its taxation year end on December 15 if it is a MFT on the 74th day after the end of a calendar year and its taxation year (the taxation year concerned) would normally end on December 31 of the calendar year.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" css=".vc_custom_1458057665089{padding-top: 15px !important;}"][vc_column width="3/4"][vc_single_image image="71055" img_size="large" add_caption="yes"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" css=".vc_custom_1458060471484{padding-top: 2px !important;}"][vc_separator color="#00c96d" type="normal" thickness="2" up="" down="25"][vc_column_text]

item.title: Tax Efficiency
item.dc:creator: cpadmin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="container" padding_top="" padding_bottom="" css=".vc_custom_1458057033586{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]
We only invest in exchange traded funds (ETFs), which are generally more tax‑efficient compared to mutual funds. Investing with ETFs can provide an estimated 0.7% in tax savings per year versus holding similar investment strategies in mutual funds.
We build separate portfolios based on the tax status of each of your accounts. We'll purchase municipal bonds in your non-IRA accounts, where you will be exempt from most taxes. We'll put core bonds in your IRA accounts, where they can grow tax‑free. We use every cash flow and dividend to rebalance your portfolio, which reduces the need to sell shares to rebalance. This can lower your capital gains tax over time, and maintains the risk and return of your portfolio without you lifting a finger. Plus, our sophisticated infrastructure will never cause short-term capital gains.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" css=".vc_custom_1458057665089{padding-top: 15px !important;}"][vc_column width="3/4"][vc_single_image image="71055" img_size="large" add_caption="yes"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" css=".vc_custom_1458060471484{padding-top: 2px !important;}"][vc_separator color="#00c96d" type="normal" thickness="2" up="" down="25"][vc_column_text]

With our advisory services, you make your own decisions while working alongside your Private Banker/Investment Advisor.
You have complete control of your portfolio, and can feel confident that you understand the rationale and risks involved in any investments you make. Whether you’re experienced or new to investing, we can give you the appropriate level of advice. The service is highly collaborative. We make recommendations and discuss them with you in detail before you make the final decision. The advisory investment service helps you to construct and manage your portfolio, and also gives you updates and reports. This service could be suitable for you if you want to make your own decisions based on our investment advice.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" css=".vc_custom_1458057665089{padding-top: 15px !important;}"][vc_column width="3/4"][vc_single_image image="71055" img_size="large" add_caption="yes"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" css=".vc_custom_1458060471484{padding-top: 2px !important;}"][vc_separator color="#00c96d" type="normal" thickness="2" up="" down="25"][vc_column_text]

item.title: FAQs
item.dc:creator: cpadmin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="container"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

If you've any questions that aren't answered in our FAQ guide below don't hesitate to contact us and we'll get right back to you.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container"][vc_column][vc_toggle title="How is Fintech different from a traditional 401(k) plan? " color="mulled_wine" el_id="1458927041462-cf61ebee-c19a"]With traditional 401(k)s, generally participants are asked to choose between a selection of funds, often with minimal insight into their fees, track record, or how to allocate across funds. In contrast, Fintech for Business provides a 401(k) that includes personalized investment advice. This advice is holistic, and is designed to help you meet your retirement goals by accounting for your full financial picture, including cost of living, net worth, spousal assets, income, and external accounts.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="How do I transfer my IRA to Fintech? " color="mulled_wine" el_id="1458927069778-f913a189-ecb4"]To transfer your existing IRA to Fintech, we will use a direct transfer process to avoid any tax consequences. A direct transfer entails your current provider sending us a check of your funds directly, for your benefit.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="How long does it take to transfer money?" color="mulled_wine" el_id="1458936004707-ba42dc82-a2d9"]Electronic deposits from your bank to Fintech typically invest the following business day for deposits made before 11PM EST. This includes requests made on Saturday and Sunday. The only exception is auto-deposits that fall on weekends. If your auto-deposit falls on the weekend, it will invest on Tuesday (assuming that Monday is not a market holiday).[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Is there a minimum deposit or balance?" color="mulled_wine" el_id="1458936042154-e225962f-54a7"]There is no minimum investment at Fintech, and no minimum balance. One reason we have no minimum balance is to ensure that every investor can get started building wealth with both long-term and short-term goals.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="How can I rollover my 401(k), 403(b) or similar plan?" color="mulled_wine" el_id="1458936078451-c1f08b68-eaf2"]There are many benefits to rolling over a retirement plan into Fintech. We'll use the "direct rollover" method to prevent any withholding or negative tax consequences for you. This entails your current provider sending us a check of your funds directly, for your benefit.[/vc_toggle][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Privacy
item.dc:creator: cpadmin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="container" css=".vc_custom_1458944276931{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

What is this Privacy Policy for?

The policy sets out the different areas where user privacy is concerned and outlines the obligations & requirements of the users, the website and website owners. Furthermore the way this website processes, stores and protects user data and information will also be detailed within this policy.

The Website

This website and its owners take a proactive approach to user privacy and ensure the necessary steps are taken to protect the privacy of its users throughout their visiting experience.

Use of Cookies

This website uses cookies to better the users experience while visiting the website. Where applicable this website uses a cookie control system allowing the user on their first visit to the website to allow or disallow the use of cookies on their computer / device. This complies with recent legislation requirements for websites to obtain explicit consent from users before leaving behind or reading files such as cookies on a user's computer / device. Cookies are small files saved to the user's computers hard drive that track, save and store information about the user's interactions and usage of the website. This allows the website, through its server to provide the users with a tailored experience within this website. Users are advised that if they wish to deny the use and saving of cookies from this website on to their computers hard drive they should take necessary steps within their web browsers security settings to block all cookies from this website and its external serving vendors. This website uses tracking software to monitor its visitors to better understand how they use it. This software is provided by Google Analytics which uses cookies to track visitor usage. The software will save a cookie to your computers hard drive in order to track and monitor your engagement and usage of the website, but will not store, save or collect personal information. You can read Google's privacy policy here for further information [ http://www.google.com/privacy.html ]. Other cookies may be stored to your computers hard drive by external vendors when this website uses referral programs, sponsored links or adverts. Such cookies are used for conversion and referral tracking and typically expire after 30 days, though some may take longer. No personal information is stored, saved or collected.

Contact & Communication

Users contacting this website and/or its owners do so at their own discretion and provide any such personal details requested at their own risk. Your personal information is kept private and stored securely until a time it is no longer required or has no use, as detailed in the Data Protection Act 1998. Every effort has been made to ensure a safe and secure form to email submission process but advise users using such form to email processes that they do so at their own risk. This website and its owners use any information submitted to provide you with further information about the products / services they offer or to assist you in answering any questions or queries you may have submitted. This includes using your details to subscribe you to any email newsletter program the website operates but only if this was made clear to you and your express permission was granted when submitting any form to email process. Or whereby you the consumer have previously purchased from or enquired about purchasing from the company a product or service that the email newsletter relates to. This is by no means an entire list of your user rights in regard to receiving email marketing material. Your details are not passed on to any third parties.

Email Newsletter

This website operates an email newsletter program, used to inform subscribers about products and services supplied by this website. Users can subscribe through an online automated process should they wish to do so but do so at their own discretion. Some subscriptions may be manually processed through prior written agreement with the user.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: This privacy policy is for this website and governs the privacy of its users who choose to use it.

item.title: Local Taxation
item.dc:creator: cpadmin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="container" padding_top="" padding_bottom="" css=".vc_custom_1458057033586{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]
A tax assessed and levied by a local authority such as a county or municipality. A local tax is usually collected in the form of property taxes, and is used to fund a wide range of civic services from garbage collection to sewer maintenance. The amount of local taxes may vary widely from one jurisdiction to the next.
Unlike federal or state taxes, the benefits arising from local taxes are generally apparent at the community level. Municipalities have to face a constant balancing act with regards to levying local taxes, since rising taxes may lead to "taxpayer revolt," while low taxation levels may lead to a cutback of essential services.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" css=".vc_custom_1458057665089{padding-top: 15px !important;}"][vc_column width="3/4"][vc_single_image image="71055" img_size="large" add_caption="yes"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" css=".vc_custom_1458060471484{padding-top: 2px !important;}"][vc_separator color="#00c96d" type="normal" thickness="2" up="" down="25"][vc_column_text]

item.title: International Taxation
item.dc:creator: cpadmin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row type="container" padding_top="" padding_bottom="" css=".vc_custom_1458057033586{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]
International taxation is the study or determination of tax on a person or business subject to the tax laws of different countries or the international aspects of an individual country's tax laws as the case may be.
Governments usually limit the scope of their income taxation in some manner territorially or provide for offsets to taxation relating to extraterritorial income. The manner of limitation generally takes the form of a territorial, residency, or exclusionary system. Some governments have attempted to mitigate the differing limitations of each of these three broad systems by enacting a hybrid system with characteristics of two or more. Many governments tax individuals and/or enterprises on income. Such systems of taxation vary widely, and there are no broad general rules.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="container" css=".vc_custom_1458057665089{padding-top: 15px !important;}"][vc_column width="3/4"][vc_single_image image="71055" img_size="large" add_caption="yes"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" css=".vc_custom_1458060471484{padding-top: 2px !important;}"][vc_separator color="#00c96d" type="normal" thickness="2" up="" down="25"][vc_column_text]
